summary:
- **Drilling Results**: High-grade copper intercepts at Jericho Deposit, including:  
  - **Jolly Shoot (J1 Lens)**:  
    - 7.0m @ 2.4% Cu & 0.4g/t Au  
    - 6.0m @ 2.4% Cu & 1.8g/t Au  
    - 7.2m @ 2.8% Cu & 0.5g/t Au (incl. 2.2m @ 7.6% Cu & 1.2g/t Au)  
  - **Tucker Shoot (J2 Lens)**:  
    - 3.1m @ 3.0% Cu & 0.4g/t Au  
    - 6.0m @ 1.8% Cu & 0.6g/t Au  
- **Implications**: Confirms high-grade mineralization near planned Jericho Link Drive, enhancing potential for early ore development. Mineralization remains open down-plunge.  
- **Upcoming**: Additional drilling results expected in coming months.  

*Note: No capital markets or trading-specific actions (e.g., raising, halt) identified.*
